benefits.title: Complimentary Club Marriott Membership
benefits.description: Complimentary Club Marriott membership for first year. Up to 25% discounts for Dining & stay across Asia â€“ Pacific region. Member's Night on Monday: Buy one drink, get a complimentary second drink. Member's Day on Tuesday: 50% off on food bill & 25% off on beverage bill.

benefits.title: Unlimited Airport Lounge Access
benefits.description: Unlimited complimentary global airport lounge access for primary and add-on cardholders. Domestic and International access via Priority Pass.

benefits.title: Golf Benefits
benefits.description: Unlimited Complimentary Golf lessons & games at leading courses. 100% green fee waiver at select courses. 24x7 Golf Concierge Assistance.

benefits.title: 24x7 Global Personal Concierge
benefits.description: Customized bookings & assistance for travel, entertainment, and business experiences.

benefits.title: Insurance Benefits
benefits.description: Accidental Air Death cover worth Rs. 3 Crore, Emergency overseas hospitalization up to Rs. 50 lakhs, Credit Shield Cover for upto 9 lakhs.

milestones.benefit: Renewal Fee Waiver (for cards sourced before Oct 18, 2021)
